title: The Use of measuring instruments: the burette
creator_credit: Australian Teaching Films and L.M. Simmons
brief_description: A demonstration of the correct use of the burette. Includes checking apparatus, rinsing, placing in stand, draining, filling, removing air bubbles, measuring a specified amount of liquid, emptying, cleaning and packing up after use.
title_for_label: The Use of measuring instruments: the burette
